fields.summary: Android: TextField and TextArea - Black stripe appears above the text field at the bottom of the screen
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.0.201210271747
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.4.v20121026164613
Devices: Galaxy Nexus (4.1.1), Samsung Galaxy SIII (4.0.4)

comments.body: The issue only happens when the height of the text field/text area is very small and the backgroundColor of the text field/text area is set.

Looks like the issue is caused due to the fact that the default font for the text field is too large to fit in the height provided. 

Setting a font height that actually fits the text field fixes the issue. Marking as wont fix.
